name: NEW Unordinary Outcast
description:
After a long slumber, a young boy has finally wake up and check on the outside world. Only to see that everything he once saw has change during his absent.

Controls for Keyboard / Mouse / PlayStation or Xbox Controller

Movement: Arrow Keys Left Click Directional Buttons or Left Analogue Stick Interact: Z Button Left Click X / A Menu/Cancel: X Button Right Click Menu: Triangle / Y - Cancel: Circle / B

Patch Notes:

  • Update #1: Released Playable Demo
